attachments.displayName:
When a photograph looks more like a painting...
When a place transports you into a world of peace and tranquility...
When the serene greenery, rolling hills, and soft clouds dotting the blue expanse give you a feeling of buoyancy and exhilaration for no particular reason...
Munnar...being one with nature
http://www.learningandcreativity.com/album/7485/?id=17
